author: v-mimcbr
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->
## Steps to reproduce

run Set-AuthenticodeSignature -Certificate $cert -FilePath $AttachedScript
## Expected behavior

Only the signature should change
## Actual behavior

$Global:LogRoot = "\cyprus\share\ITScriptOutput" 
to
$Global:LogRoot = "\cyprus\share\ITScriptOutput

The last character was removed
[settings.txt](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/files/445770/settings.txt)
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```

comments.author: GeeLaw
comments.body:
This issue is reproducible for:

```
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.14393.82
PSEdition                      Desktop
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   10.0.14393.82
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

comments.author: ThomasNieto
comments.body: @v-mimcbr is this still an issue with the latest version of PowerShell?

title: Set-AuthenticodeSignature Changes Script
